plot: Lisa tries to restore the reputation of a forgotten Springfield female inventor, while Bart takes full advantage of a diagnosis that he is a sociopath.

Lisa sets out to restore the tarnished reputation of Springfield's first female inventor in an abandoned asylum; Bart joins her and steals one of the homicidal patient's notebooks and brags he wrote the entries himself, causing Homer and Marge to believe he is a sociopath.—Anonymous

Learning that Amelia Vanderbuckle, Springfield's first female inventor, was not recognized and put in an asylum, Lisa seeks out her notebooks and discovers that she built an early computer. On the visit to the now disused asylum, Bart finds a sociopath's diary that Chief Wiggum comes to believe was written by Bart, leading to a spell in a psychiatric unit before his true nature comes out.—don @ minifie-1
